original: 旁白  ( 特別邀請 )曹操、黃忠、左慈、雲遊仙人孫權、周瑜、趙雲、關平、步騭、朱治劉備、周泰、公孫瓚、曹丕關羽、董卓、夏侯淵、華佗、流浪商人張飛、太史慈、周倉、荀彧、龐德、李儒諸葛亮、典韋、許褚、黃蓋呂布、孫策、徐晃、馬岱郭嘉、賈詡、龐統、曹煥、陳琳司馬懿、甘寧、袁術、陸遜、魏延袁紹、曹仁、孟獲、何進、秦琪孫堅、夏侯惇、張角、張昭呂蒙、鐘會、徐庶、虞翻馬超、張遼、馬良、張郃、姜維法正、文醜、馬騰、程普魯肅、陳宮、李典、淩統、紀靈、李傕貂蟬、孫尚香大喬小喬、甄宓黃月英、祝融夫人關鳳、王元姬
text: Narrator (Special Invitation) Cao Cao, Huang Zhong, Zuo Ci, Wandering Immortal Sun Quan, Zhou Yu, Zhao Yun, Guan Ping, Bu Jia, Zhu Zhi Liu Bei, Zhou Tai, Gongsun Zan, Cao Pi Guan Yu, Dong Zhuo, Xia Houyuan, Hua Tuo, Homeless Businessman Zhang Fei , Tai Shici, Zhou Cang, Xun Yu, Pound, Li Ru Zhuge Liang, Dian Wei, Xu Chu, Huang Gai Lu Bu, Sun Ce, Xu Huang, Ma Dai Guo Jia, Jia Xu, Pang Tong, Cao Huan, Chen Lin, Sima Yi, Gan Ning , Yuan Shu, Lu Xun, Wei Yan, Yuan Shao, Cao Ren, Meng Huo, He Jin, Qin Qi, Sun Jian, Xiahou Dun, Zhang Jiao, Zhang Zhao Lumeng, Zhong Hui, Xu Shu, Yu Fan Ma Chao, Zhang Liao, Ma Liang, Zhang Yun, Jiang Wei Fazheng, Wen Chou, Ma Teng, Cheng Pulusu, Chen Gong, Li Dian, Ling Tong, Ji Ling, Li Chang Diaochan, Sun Shangxiang, Da Qiao Xiaoqiao, Zhen Mi Huang Yueying, Zhu Rong's wife Guan Feng, Wang Yuanji
